availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Q. Dixon and Mariah Dixon. Married Lydia Dixon. Father of George Washington Dixon, Charles F. Dixon, Harvey Dowen Dixon, and James D. Dixon. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District No. 2, p. 342. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division No. 1, p. 71. Find A Grave, "Thomas W Dixon (1821-1908)," Memorial #105345665, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105345665 (accessed November 30, 2017).
